Welcome: FACE THE GRINDING, SAVE YOUR MONEY
WelcomeText: The all-in-one site for planning your future grinding.
WelcomeParagraph:
Please be aware that this website is still under active developing.
 Its main purpose is to provide simple and reliable tools to faciliate your gameplay.
 Correctness of the tools will be ensured first.
UptieCalculatorSection:
Set the status of your IDs and EGOs in "Update Settings".
Then select the IDs/EGOs that you want to uptie.
Click "Submit" at the bottom to start calculating the shards and threads you need.
ContactParagraph:
If you have found any bugs or you wish to help with the website,
feel free to contact me by joining my server.
Any help is greatly appreciated.
StatusSettingSection: Set the status of your IDs and EGOs to update the information in all tools.
